description.text: The mistreatment of your people by an arcane society has made you particularly eager to inflict harm on those who use arcane magic.

sections.Benefit: You deal +2 damage with weapon attacks made against any target you have witnessed casting an arcane spell (not using a spell-like ability) in the last 5 rounds. You must have successfully identified the spell with a Spellcraft check to know without a doubt that the spell is arcane.
